description:
First, a typhoon is coming! With Shinobu stuck at Kaede`s house, the ninja manor turns into a terrible sausage fest! Witness Onsokumaru`s darkest hour!  Then, when Onsokumaru lends his wisdom to a mushroom picking expedition, the ninjas are in for a magic
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Typhoon Arrives / The Ninjas Go Mushroom Picking
I. O Furacão Está Aqui! / II. Ninja, Na Caçada Aos Cogumelos!
Le typhon arrive / La cueillette des champignons
Taifuu ga Kita no Maki / Ninja, Kinoko Karu no Maki
台風がきたの巻 / 忍者, きのこ狩るの巻
